workflow.name: Create verified user profiles with email validation, PDF generation & Gmail delivery
workflow.description:
# Verified User Profile Creation - Automated Email Validation & PDF Generation

---

**Overview**

This comprehensive automation workflow streamlines the user onboarding process by validating email addresses, generating professional profile PDFs, and delivering them seamlessly to verified users.

**üéØ What This Workflow Does:**

1. **Receives User Data** - Webhook trigger accepts user signup information (name, email, city, profession, bio)
2. **Validates Email Addresses** - Uses VerifiEmail API to ensure only legitimate email addresses proceed
3. **Conditional Branching** - Smart logic splits workflow based on email verification results
4. **Generates HTML Profile** - Creates beautifully styled HTML templates with user information
5. **Converts to PDF** - Transforms HTML into professional, downloadable PDF documents
6. **Email Delivery** - Sends personalized welcome emails with PDF attachments to verified users
7. **Data Logging** - Records all verified users in Google Sheets for analytics and tracking
8. **Rejection Handling** - Notifies users with invalid emails and provides guidance

**‚ú® Key Features:**

- ‚úÖ **Email Verification** - Prevents fake registrations and maintains data quality
- üìÑ **Professional PDF Generation** - Beautiful, branded profile documents
- üìß **Automated Email Delivery** - Personalized welcome messages with attachments
- üìä **Google Sheets Logging** - Complete audit trail of all verified users
- üîÄ **Smart Branching** - Separate paths for valid and invalid emails
- üé® **Modern Design** - Clean, responsive HTML/CSS templates
- üîí **Secure Webhook** - POST endpoint for seamless form integration

**üéØ Perfect Use Cases:**

- User registration systems
- Community membership verification
- Professional certification programs
- Event registration with verified attendees
- Customer onboarding processes
- Newsletter signup verification
- Educational platform enrollments
- Membership card generation

**üì¶ What's Included:**

- Complete workflow with 12 informative sticky notes
- Pre-configured webhook endpoint
- Email verification integration
- PDF generation setup
- Gmail sending configuration
- Google Sheets logging
- Error handling guidelines
- Rejection email template

**üõ†Ô∏è Required Integrations:**

1. **VerifiEmail** - For email validation (https://verifi.email)
2. **HTMLcsstoPDF** - For PDF generation (https://htmlcsstopdf.com)
3. **Gmail OAuth2** - For email delivery
4. **Google Sheets OAuth2** - For data logging

**‚ö° Quick Setup Time:** 15-20 minutes

**üéì Skill Level:** Beginner to Intermediate
---

### **Benefits:**

‚úÖ Reduces manual verification work by 100%
‚úÖ Prevents spam and fake registrations
‚úÖ Delivers professional branded documents automatically
‚úÖ Maintains complete audit trail
‚úÖ Scales effortlessly with user growth
‚úÖ Provides excellent user experience
‚úÖ Easy integration with any form or application

---

### **Technical Details:**

- **Trigger Type:** Webhook (POST)
- **Total Nodes:** 11 (including 12 documentation sticky notes)
- **Execution Time:** ~3-5 seconds per user
- **API Calls:** 3 external (VerifiEmail, HTMLcsstoPDF, Google Sheets)
- **Email Format:** HTML with binary PDF attachment
- **Data Storage:** Google Sheets (optional)

---
### **License:** MIT (Free to use and modify)

---

## üéÅ BONUS FEATURES:

- Comprehensive sticky notes explaining each step
- Beautiful, mobile-responsive email template
- Professional PDF styling with modern design
- Easily customizable for your branding
- Ready-to-use webhook endpoint
- Error handling guidelines included

---

**Perfect for:** Developers, No-code enthusiasts, Business owners, SaaS platforms, Community managers, Event organizers

**Start automating your user verification process today!** üöÄ

parameters.content:
## üîß SETUP CREDENTIALS

**Required Credentials:**

1. **VerifiEmail API**
   - Sign up at https://verifi.email
   - Get your API key

2. **HTMLcsstoPDF API**
   - Register at https://htmlcsstoimg.com
   - Get User ID & API Key

3. **Gmail OAuth2**
   - Authenticate your Google account

4. **Google Sheets OAuth2**
   - Same Google account as Gmail

## üì• STEP 1: WEBHOOK TRIGGER

**Purpose:** Receive user signup data

**Expected JSON Input:**
```json
{
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "city": "Gurugram",
  "profession": "Software Engineer",
  "bio": "Loves building software"
}
```

## ‚úÖ STEP 2: EMAIL VERIFICATION

**Purpose:** Validate email using VerifiEmail API

**Parameters:**
- email: User's email from webhook

## ‚öñÔ∏è STEP 3: CONDITIONAL LOGIC

**Purpose:** Branch workflow based on email validation

**TRUE Path (Green):**
‚Üí Email is valid
‚Üí Generate HTML template
‚Üí Create PDF
‚Üí Send profile email
‚Üí Log to Google Sheets

**FALSE Path (Red):**
‚Üí Email is invalid
‚Üí Send rejection email
‚Üí End workflow

string.name: html_content
string.value:
=

üë§ Verified User Profile

{{ $('Webhook - Receive User Data').item.json.body.name }}

Email: {{ $('Webhook - Receive User Data').item.json.body.email }}

City: {{ $('Webhook - Receive User Data').item.json.body.city }}

Profession: {{ $('Webhook - Receive User Data').item.json.body.profession }}

Bio: {{ $('Webhook - Receive User Data').item.json.body.bio }}

‚úÖ Verified by n8n Automation
Generated on: {{ new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }) }}

parameters.content:
## üßæ STEP 4: HTML TEMPLATE CREATION

**Purpose:** Create beautiful HTML profile layout

**Features:**
- Modern, responsive design
- Custom styling with CSS
- Dynamic data from webhook
- Professional appearance

## üìÑ STEP 5: PDF GENERATION

**Purpose:** Convert HTML to downloadable image/PDF

**Request Body:**
- html: The generated HTML content
- google_fonts: Inter font family
- viewport_width: 800px
- viewport_height: 1200px

## üíæ STEP 6: DOWNLOAD PDF

**Purpose:** Fetch the generated PDF as binary data

**Method:** GET request to the URL returned by HTMLcsstoPDF

parameters.subject: Your Verified Profile PDF is Ready ‚úÖ

parameters.content:
## üìß STEP 7: EMAIL DELIVERY

**Purpose:** Send profile PDF to verified user

**Gmail Configuration:**
- **To:** User's email from webhook
- **Subject:** "Your Verified Profile PDF is Ready ‚úÖ"
- **Type:** HTML email
- **Body:** Personalized message with profile summary
- **Attachment:** PDF binary data from previous node

## üìä STEP 8: DATA LOGGING

**Purpose:** Track all verified users in Google Sheets

**Spreadsheet Columns:**
1. **Name** - User's full name
2. **Email** - Verified email address
3. **City** - User's location
4. **Profession** - Job title/role
5. **Verified** - ‚úÖ checkmark
6. **PDF_URL** - Link to generated PDF
7. **Date** - Verification timestamp

parameters.message:
=

Hi {{ $('Webhook - Receive User Data').item.json.body.name }},

We couldn't verify your email address: {{ $('Webhook - Receive User Data').item.json.body.email }}

This could be due to:

  • Invalid email format
  • Non-existent email domain
  • Temporary email service
  • Disposable email address

What to do next:

Please check your email address and try registering again with a valid email.

If you believe this is an error, please contact our support team.

‚Äì The Verification Team
parameters.subject: Profile Verification Failed ‚ùå

parameters.content:
## üö´ STEP 9: INVALID EMAIL HANDLING

**Purpose:** Notify users when email verification fails

**Email Details:**
- **Subject:** "Profile Verification Failed ‚ùå"
- **Message:** Explains why verification failed
- **Guidance:** Steps to resolve the issue

**Common Failure Reasons:**
- Invalid format
- Non-existent domain
- Temporary/disposable email
- Typo in email address

## ‚úÖ WORKFLOW COMPLETE!

**Success Path Summary:**
‚úÖ Webhook receives user data
‚úÖ Email verified via API
‚úÖ HTML profile generated
‚úÖ PDF created and downloaded
‚úÖ Profile emailed to user
‚úÖ Data logged to Google Sheets

**Failure Path Summary:**
‚ùå Email verification fails
‚ùå Rejection email sent
‚ùå No PDF generated
‚ùå No data logged

user.name: Jitesh Dugar

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
